title: While do fans support Destiny knowing that it's a cash grab?
body: After the DLC taken king release fiasco along with all the "instant level to 25" bullshit and just about everything else over the past year i would expect that Destiny would be dying solely from terrible PR but apparently thats not the case. The actually case is that destiny sales are actually still going strong and the playerbase is still large. Whuuut?
